mapper.select: /* selectMngrSiteListForIPManage */ SELECT s.site_code, s.site_name, i.ip_desc_type, i.ip_desc FROM t_site AS s LEFT JOIN t_ipmanage AS i ON s.site_code = i.site_code
/* mngrIPManageBySiteCode */ SELECT s.site_code, s.site_name, i.ip_desc_type, i.ip_desc FROM t_site AS s LEFT JOIN t_ipmanage AS i ON s.site_code = i.site_code WHERE s.site_code = #{siteCode}
mapper.insert: /* insertMngrIPManage */ INSERT INTO t_ipmanage ( site_code, ip_desc_type, ip_desc, regmemid, regdt ) VALUES ( #{siteCode}, #{ipDescType}, #{ipDesc}, #{regMemId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: /* updateMngrIPManage */ UPDATE t_ipmanage SET ip_desc_type = #{ipDescType}, ip_desc = #{ipDesc}, updmemid = #{updMemId}, upddt = now() WHERE site_code = #{siteCode};
